original_text: Therefore shall the land mourn, and every one that dwelleth therein shall languish, with the beasts of the field, and with the fowls of heaven; yea, the fishes of the sea also shall be taken away.
korean_text: 그러므로 이 땅이 슬퍼하며 거기 사는 자와 들짐승과 공중에 나는 새가 다 쇠잔할 것이요 바다의 고기도 없어지리라

sentences.original_text: and every one that dwelleth therein shall languish
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 거하는 모든 자가 쇠약해질 것이며

sentences.original_text: with the beasts of the field
and with the fowls of heaven
yea, the fishes of the sea also shall be taken away
